title: Forums Filter Suggestion
body:
Can we get a sort filter on the boards home page? Like i know we can choose Best/Hot/New/Recent, but what i'm suggesting is another sort filter. 
E.g. You sort by Hot, and then filter by Last 24 hours/ Last Week/ Last Month etc... like when you search something specifically. 

Thanks for reading
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body:
Mmmmm that'd be kinda neat. The suggestion you're making about sorting by time is mostly how "New" and a little how "Recent" works, but I get what you mean. 

You can use the Search bar on the left to search for a topic and then search within, for example, the last 24 hours or week if you need. Not sure how likely it is that we'll get new general sorting features on the main pages though =\ .
it would be also be nice if you could search for comments not only for topics. Like every mention of that word on the boards
